data.title: Convert Madrid, Spain Time to Central Time
data.meta_description: Quickly convert time in Madrid, Spain to Central European Time (CET) with this easy-to-use, modern time zone converter.
data.text:
Converting Madrid Time to CET

This time zone converter lets you visually and very quickly convert Madrid, Spain time to CET and vice-versa. Simply mouse over the colored hour-tiles and glance at the hours selected by the column... and done!
